pages.text: Gross.$(br2)This questionable stew is part of the pledging rite.$(br2)By drinking while deeply looking into the eyes of a $(l:bewitchment:creatures/demon)Greater Demon$(), a witch can pledge to them.$(br2)Pledging to a $(l:bewitchment:creatures/demon)Greater Demon$() has unique benefits depending on the $(l:bewitchment:creatures/demon)Demon$().

The exact benefits are outlined in the according entries.$(br2)A $(l:bewitchment:creatures/demon)Demon$() that is pledged to has to remain in the world for the pledge to be active, and a witch can only pledge to a single $(l:bewitchment:creatures/demon)Demon$() at a time.$(br2)Attacking the $(l:bewitchment:creatures/demon)Demon$() in any way will immediately revoke the pledge.
It is important to note that witches that taint their soul this way are prone to the same weaknesses as $(l:bewitchment:creatures/demon)Demons$().
